Hungry for More

Morimori, the gourmet with a grandiose
appetite, has an incredibly rumbly
tummy. Fill it up until she has been
satisfied.

Morimori ate so much that she swelled
up like a balloon. This has prompted
her to find a job that makes use of her
prodigious culinary consumption.

Feed Morimori food in Formide
Shopping Ward, Iira.

Feed Morimori desserts in Formide
Shopping Ward, Iira.
100k in the Red

Momimi's vases from Pyrithium Trade
Guild just will not sell. Help her raise
some money - she claims she only
needs 100,000G more.

Momimi left to lend 1,000,000G to
a large-bodied individual. Said
individual is allegedly donating the
money to a very special lady...

Sell high-value Collectibles to Momimi
in Orem Storage Ward, Iira, until
you reach 500MMMM.
Hubbie Takes a Hike

Fisherwoman Chico is on the lookout
for her missing husband. If you see him,
she wants you to tell him to come back
to Iira.

Anglen returned safely to Iira, but
had already set out for a new fishing
spot. Still, it's clear that the couple
have something special between them.

Search for Chico's husband around
Coolley Lake, Gula.

Talk to Chico in Formide Shopping
Ward, Iira.
The Superbian Gunman

Sharpshooter Bathein of the Superbian
Imperial Army is spoiling for a real
fight. Give him one.

Bathein lost the bout against Laura
because of the strong bonds she
shared with her teammates. He then
vows to become a respected soldier.

Defeat Bathein at Lasqam Cove,
Gula.

Talk to Bathein at Lasqam Cove,
Gula.
A Taste of Home

Prepare the meal that Hassan

Barmy Tale of Barney

According to Isabella, an adventurer by
the name of Blue Barney hid his loot in
the nearby Haradd Hills, guarded by
monsters and a seal. Find it if you can!

Isabella was thrilled to hear you found
the treasure. She said there are other
Barney Stones scattered around, so
make sure to keep your eyes peeled!

Search the vicinity of Haradd Hills

Here Be Treasure?

Sahel bought a treasure map from
a Nopon, but failed to find anything.
She wants you to go back and check in
case there was something she missed.

There was indeed treasure buried
underground. You brought it back to
Sahel to prove the map's veracity,
and that was enough for her.

Search for treasure on the Golden

Report back to Sahel at the

For Lack of a Hunter

The Feris in the region of Hyber Village
have been getting aggressive of late.
Gather some Feris Beastmeat in Baus's
stead.

You collected the Feris Beastmeat and
handed it over to Baus. As thanks, he
furtively taught you one of innkeeper
Teo's closely-guarded recipes.

Collect Feris Beastmeat from Sowl

Village, Iira.

Hand the Feris Beastmeat over to

Seeking a Seeker

Adventurer Zenma is in a bind now
that his Seeker is broken. He wants
you to collect a Bat Hinge and a Scarlet
Coil to act as substitute parts.

Zenma is pleased with the parts you
found for him. Now he should be
able to retrieve all sorts of useful
mechanical odds and ends.

Make camp and craft a Silver Seeker.

Gather a Bat Hinge in Gula.

Hand over the machine parts to

Hakushi, the Miasma Slayer

Hakushi was out studying ether and Divine Beasts
when he got assaulted by monsters.
Now he's asking you to clear them out!

You defeated the Espina Feris and told
Hakushi that the coast is clear. He can now
continue his research into ether and
Divine Beasts in relative peace.

Defeat the Espina Feris that

Punpun's Rival

Punpun enjoys nothing more than

You showed the monsters a lesson

Where's the Boy Gone?

A Gulan boy has been sighted near

Reconstruction work on Lett Bridge,

Desert medicine is needed to cross the

Montos made you the desert medicine,
and the preparations for crossing the

Next stop - Aurium, the royal capital!
